item.title: Lorem Ipsum, but Make It Mechanical
item.description:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

A shaft spins. A bearing complains. Nothing meaningful is learned.
